Title: aRts: Privilege escalation
Synopsis:
The artswrapper part of aRts allows local users to execute arbitrary code
    with elevated privileges.

Background.Text: aRts is a real time modular system for synthesizing audio used by KDE. artswrapper is a helper application used to start the aRts daemon.

Description.Text: artswrapper fails to properly check whether it can drop privileges accordingly if setuid() fails due to a user exceeding assigned resource limits.

Impact.Text: Local attackers could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Note that the aRts package provided by Gentoo is only vulnerable if the artswrappersuid USE-flag is enabled.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All aRts users should upgrade to the latest version:
